snippet.title: Raji: An Ancient Epic - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Raji: An Ancient Epic is an action adventure game set in Ancient India. Raji, a young girl chosen by the gods, will stand against the demonic invasion into the human's realm. Her destiny is to rescue her younger brother and face the demon lord Mahabalasura.

Fore more on Raji: An Ancient Epic, follow the game on social media on the following channels.

► Visit our official page https://www.rajithegame.com/
Subscribe https://www.rajithegame.com/blog
► Find Raji on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rajithegame/
► Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RajitheGame
► Like Raji selfies on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rajithegame/
► Share you review on Reddit:  https://www.reddit.com/r/rajithegame/
► Join other fans in Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/f9gnFVP
► Use Press Kit to share about Raji: https://www.rajithegame.com/presskit

All footage was captured in-game.

Disclaimer - This is not a representation of the final game.
